description:
Minami-chan is surprised to find out both Noa-chan and Yuu-chan can’t swim.
Noa-chan insists she can handle the pool as long as she has a water tube.
The image of Noa-chan carrying a water tube excites Mai-chan, but she is a bit hesitant when Minami-chan suggests they should all go swimming.
Mai-chan arrives at the water park and is eager to play with Noa-chan, but she didn’t mention the fact she can’t swim either...
Source: crunchyroll
